title: Project 1: Sherlock Picasso
description: AI Marketing tool for Small Business. Developed as part of Google PM Hackathon.

title: Project 2: CircularInsightAI
description: We built CircularInsightAI, an AI-powered system that innovatively evaluates circular economy ideas using a multi-faceted filter and enhancer approach. It is designed to empower investors in making efficient and informed assessments.
